issue.title: GPU laser and ogre test failures with ATI

content.raw:
Another approach: make ServerFixture to analyze and/or export Ogre logs (every ogre.log is renamed using the name of the loaded world to ogre_$world.log) on every unload.

I've implemented this on d182a28, using two enviroment variables "OGRE_ASSERT_ON_ERRORS" and 
"OGRE_EXPORT_LOGS".
content.html:
Another approach: make ServerFixture to analyze and/or export Ogre logs (every ogre.log is renamed using the name of the loaded world to ogre_$world.log) on every unload.

I've implemented this on d182a28, using two enviroment variables "OGRE_ASSERT_ON_ERRORS" and "OGRE_EXPORT_LOGS".
